title: FS: Three SGC graded off backs. Phelps AB, Jennings Tolstoi - ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Three SGC graded off backs. Phelps AB, Jennings Tolstoi - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have some SGC graded off back available.  Available via PM for any questions. Will consider trades for key PSA EPDGs and cash either way. Just let me know what you may have available. 

$SOLD Randall Cycle 350 SGC 4
$SOLD Phelps American Beauty 350 frame SGC 2
$SOLDJennings both hands Tolstoi SGC 1

Thanks for looking!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2m7Egyi][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/51271193469_2e6e62a6d1_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[quote name="big-six" post=2116878]I’ll take the Phelps[/QUOTE]

My apologies on the delay….the Phelps did get taken via PM prior to your comment.
